alert.note: Alert for Northeast Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 8:35AM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Highest accumulations above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Anatone, Cloverland Road, Mountain Road, and Peola. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
